ygData.subject: Re: Tentacle Whip
ygData.msgSnippet: I consider the tentacle whip to be one of those screwed up weapons.  By the time you are able to obtain one they are already obsolete.  I am not sure why
ygData.messageBody:
I consider the tentacle whip to be one of those screwed up weapons. By the
time you are able to obtain one they are already obsolete. I am not sure
why Verant seems to put level one spells on weapons that will be obtained
by people over 15. It gives you 4 hit points per proc, 4 hp is a joke. I
usually like to throw the crystal staffs (except fire) in to this also but
at least they have a bit better base damage.

But even though they are junk, every once in a while I will switch to them
if I am in a full group and we are handling everything well. ...I just
enjoy seeing the procs =) Right now I am looking forward to 25 when my
Gnoll hide lariet will come out to play, by then I should have 2.


At 05:10 PM 1/26/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: Mike.Langlois@...
>
>
>
>I noticed that during the Dual Wield thread, some of you fine Bards said that
>you use a Tentacle Whip.
>
>I have one, but have never used it, due to the low damage and low proc.
>Instead
>I'm using one Barbed and one Dragoon Dirk.
>
>Do you feel that the low delay makes it viable? Have you seen the proc
>damage/heal be enough to be attractive?
>
>I'd hate to think that I'm letting this baby sit because I'm too much of a
>goober to know better :P
>
>Golias, Whips A Plenty
